ygData.subject: Re: divine aura and gating?
ygData.msgSnippet: There are 2 different Divine Aura Spells, one being Divine Aura and the other being Divine barrier, you can have both of those memorized at the same time and
ygData.messageBody:
There are 2 different Divine Aura Spells, one being Divine Aura and the other being Divine barrier, you can have both of those memorized at the same time and use them in succession. Divine barrier not only renders you invulnerable for short time, but also regens a small amount of HP and Stamina back.
-----Original Message-----
From: FlashD <DunleyG@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 10:49 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] divine aura and gating?


Hi, I had heard you can memorize DA TWICE, and cast it in sucsession? Is this True? and how do I do it. I've tried but no luck, evan bout 2 DA's but not help
